title: End-to-End ML Pipeline using Python
features: Designed and automated a scalable end‑to‑end ML pipeline in Python, integrating data ingestion, preprocessing, model training, and evaluation across heterogeneous datasets.
Containerized the pipeline with Docker and orchestrated CI/CD via GitHub Actions, cutting deployment time by 70% and ensuring reproducible model releases.
Deployed models to AWS SageMaker, built real‑time monitoring dashboards tracking prediction drift, achieving 95% uptime and enabling proactive retraining.
